page.title: 12FLAMBOROUGH SCHOOL
page.content: Flamborough's first school was opened in 1845. In 1974 our new school was opened by Princess Margaret. The square shaped hall is central. Off two sides are teaching areas which can be closed off into two classrooms. The kitchens and administrative block are off a third side. Another teaching area should have been built off the fourth side but was not completed due to lack of money and falling numbers. We do have one mobile classroom in the grounds. At present there is a head and four full time teachers. Class 1 is the infant class with 28 children; Class 2 has 22 top infants and first year junior children; Class 3 has 30 second and third years and Class 4 - 31 third and fourth years. We have a small yard but a large playing field surrounded by young trees.
